parameters.name: filters
parameters.description:
Filter accounts by the above query parameters.
Example: { "name[eq]" : "My Account" } which will search for accounts with name = "My Account".

parameters.name: per_page
parameters.description: The number of items to return per page Default: 50 Limit: 200

parameters.name: account_id
parameters.description: Search Credit Notes by account Id

parameters.name: account_name
parameters.description: Search Credit Notes by account name

parameters.name: account_number
parameters.description: Search Credit Notes by account number

parameters.name: balance_due
parameters.description: Search Credit Notes by balance due

parameters.name: credit_note_date
parameters.description: Search Credit Notes by credit note date

parameters.name: credit_note_number
parameters.description: Search Credit Notes by credit note number

parameters.name: non_taxable
parameters.description: Search for non taxable credit notes

parameters.name: organization_id
parameters.description: Search Credit Notes by organization id

parameters.name: refunds_made
parameters.description: Search Credit Notes by refunds made

parameters.name: sub_total_after_discount
parameters.description: Search Credit Notes by sub-total after discount

parameters.name: total_discount
parameters.description: Search Credit Notes by total discount

parameters.name: total_tax
parameters.description: Search Credit Notes by total tax

parameters.name: voucher_header_id
parameters.description: Search Credit Notes by voucher header id

parameters.name: filters
parameters.description:
Filter Credit Notes by the above query parameters.
Example: { "total[gt]" : 6000 } which will search for credit notes that have a total greater than "6000".

parameters.name: sort[asc]
parameters.description: Sort Credit Notes in ascending order

parameters.name: sort[desc]
parameters.description: Sort Credit Notes in descending order

parameters.name: per_page
parameters.description: The number of items to return per page Default: 50 Limit: 200

Example: { "name[eq]" : "My Discount" } which will search for discounts with name = "My Discount".
